title: Why El Salvador made bitcoin a national currency
description:
El Salvador recently became the first and only country to recognize bitcoin as an official currency. It’s a high-risk, high-reward experiment for the  and the world is watching. The Wall Street Journal’s Caitlin Ostroff explains.

Read Caitlin’s work here.
